attributes.action: Make Monday 12 July a public Holiday to commemorate the 1st England Euro Victory
attributes.additional_details: Given the recent covid pandemic and sacrifices made all over the country, this victory has been a much needed source of inspiration and therefore should be commemorated for this generation and future generations alike. It must mark the end of a dark period, and the dawn of a new post covid era.
attributes.background: The government should make Monday 12th July a public Holiday to commemorate the Euro England victory.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Bank Holiday Monday if England get to the finals of the Euro’s 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590584

Give the UK a Bank Holiday on Monday July 12th if England win Euro 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590282
